page.name: Step 3: Drafting
page.content:
Drafting is a process, and not the final written piece. Teach learners that itâ€™s common practice to form multiple drafts of a story. Highlight how learners can use this to their advantage by bringing in sample texts or drafts to show learners. Consider sharing multiple drafts of your own work and how each evolved. 

Break down the writing into component parts:

  • Introduction
  • Body
  • Conclusion

Focus on one section or part at a time.
